name: Kiko: The Last Totem
description:
Can you help Kiko in his quest to get the precious totem back?

Featured at the WWDC 2011 Apple's Keynote!
_____________________

Simply swipe each character with one finger to make them move to their respective targets. Use obstacles at your advantage!

Solve 200 levels through 4 beautiful worlds, create your own levels using the level editor and share them with your friends!

Hundreds of levels to unlock, Thousands to create!
_____________________

COOL FEATURES:

• Solve over 200 exciting and fun levels, divided in three levels of difficulty
• Create your own levels with the easy-to-use Level Editor and send them to your friends!
• Hours of swiping puzzle fun!
• Unlock 15 achievements and compete on leaderboards through Game Center
• Georgous & Crisp graphics optimized for Retina Display
• Great soundtrack and sound effects (music composed by Mike Weiser)

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING!

"Awesome app. Super fun, and not to mention extremely addicting. It even has a level editor to challenge your friends! Awesome. Check it out!"
- Player Review

"Kiko: The Last Totem is a competently-made, challenging little puzzle game. It's definitely worth checking out."
- 4/5 Gamezebo

"The graphics and sound are absolutely top-notch in this game. If you’re into puzzle games, then this one is a must-own."
- 5/5 Appolicious

"This app is a hit in the making. Having the luxury of being able to create and share your own maps alone makes this a worthwhile buy."
- AppVader

"Kiko: The Last Totem is great example of a truly polished puzzle game on the iPhone." 
- iPhoneFreak
